opening0: BOOTING UP CARGO BAY COMPUTER INTELEGENCE...
opening2: WE HAVE WOKEN YOU EARLY FROM CRYO SLEEP TO DEAL WITH AN ANOMOLY IN THE CARGO BAY.
opening3: WE BELIEVE A CREATURE FROM CRATE X-7/2 WAS NOT PROPERLY CONTAINED IS NOW DESTROYING NEIGHBORING CARGO UNITS.
opening4: THIS IS AN UNACCEPTABLE LOSS FOR THE CORPERATION.
opening5: THERE ARE 36 CONTAINERS IN THE CARGO BAY. THEY ARE LABELED AND LOCATED BASED ON THE KEYBOARD CONFIGURATION IN FRONT OF YOU.
opening6: '1' THROUGH '9' TO 'Z' THROUGH 'PERIOD' ARE ALL VALID CARGO KEYS.
opening7: PRESS ANY CARGO KEY ON YOUR KEYBOARD TO ACTIVATE ITS DOPPLER-RADAR FROM ITS RESPECTIVE LOCATION.
opening8: PRESS SHIFT PLUS ANY CARGO KEY TO EJECT THE CONTAINER INTO SPACE.
opening11: DO NOT EJECT AN EXTRANIOUS CARGO, YOU WILL BE FINED FOR ANY UNECESSARY LOSSES.
ejectingFailed: FAILED EJECTING, CONTAINMENT UNIT TOO HEAVILY DAMAGED
totalFine: YOU HAVE BEEN FINED A TOTAL OF
